1223730.name: Trials of Mana Demo
1223730.description:
The Legend of the Sacred Sword Lives on...

Download the free Demo starting the story from where the main character begins their journey; encounter their companions and challenge Fullmetal Hugger – the mighty boss.

Choose from six main characters to lead your party of three; switching between each in fast-paced battles.

Vary your party combinations to experience the beginning of all six heroes’ journeys.

Continue where you left off by transferring your save data to the full version of Trials of Mana!

DOWNLOAD THE DEMO NOW!
1223730.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语*, 韩语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
